start-backend.name: Run Backend ExpressJs Server
start-backend.command: cd backend/src/ && npm install && npm start

start-frontend.name: Run FrontEnd Astro Server
start-frontend.command: cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev

start-apigateway.name: Run API Gateway Server
start-apigateway.command: cd api-gateway && cd bss-api-gateway && npm start
